ygData.subject: Putting Skill-Cap Questions to Rest
ygData.msgSnippet: I am trying to put together a comprehensive reference chart on all the skill caps for skills that bards can have, including general skills and trade skills.  I
ygData.messageBody:
I am trying to put together a comprehensive reference chart on all the skill
caps for skills that bards can have, including general skills and trade
skills. I have data for most of the bard-specific ones but am missing info
on some others, maybe some of you folks could help me fill in the blanks
(note that ones I was uncertain of I simply put a value of 200 - please
correct me if I am wrong):

Alcohol Tolerance: 200
Baking: 200
Begging: 100
Brewing: 200
Fishing: 200
Fletching: 200
Hand-to-Hand: 200
Jewel Craft: 200
Pottery: 200
Sense Heading: 200
Smithing: 175
Swimming: 200
Tailoring: 200
1H Blunt:200
1H Slash:200
2H Blunt:1
2H Slash:1
Bind Wound:200
Piercing:200
Singing:200
Throwing:200
Percussion:200
String:200
Dodge:125
Brass:200
Forage:40
Wind:200
Dual Wield:200
Sneak:75
Safe Fall:40
Hide:40
Instill Doubt:100
Disarm Traps:100
Track:100
Pick Lock: 100
